speaker: ADAM
text:
Dear
               
              master
              ,
               
              I
               
              can
               
              go
               
              no
               
              further
              .
               
              O
              ,
               
              I
               
              die
               
              for
              
              food
              .
               
              Here
               
              lie
               
              I
               
              down
               
              and
               
              measure
               
              out
               
              my
               
              grave
              .
              
              Farewell
              ,
               
              kind
               
              master
              .

speaker: ORLANDO
text:
Why
              ,
               
              how
               
              now
              ,
               
              Adam
              ?
               
              No
               
              greater
               
              heart
               
              in
              
              thee
              ?
               
              Live
               
              a
               
              little
              ,
               
              comfort
               
              a
               
              little
              ,
               
              cheer
               
              thyself
               
              a
              
              little
              .
               
              If
               
              this
               
              uncouth
               
              forest
               
              yield
               
              anything
               
              savage
              ,
               
              I
              
              will
               
              either
               
              be
               
              food
               
              for
               
              it
               
              or
               
              bring
               
              it
               
              for
               
              food
               
              to
               
              thee
              .
              
              Thy
               
              conceit
               
              is
               
              nearer
               
              death
               
              than
               
              thy
               
              powers
              .
               
              For
               
              my
              
              sake
              ,
               
              be
               
              comfortable
              .
               
              Hold
               
              death
               
              awhile
               
              at
               
              the
              
              arm’s
               
              end
              .
               
              I
               
              will
               
              here
               
              be
               
              with
               
              thee
               
              presently
              ,
               
              and
               
              if
              
              I
               
              bring
               
              thee
               
              not
               
              something
               
              to
               
              eat
              ,
               
              I
               
              will
               
              give
               
              thee
              
              leave
               
              to
               
              die
              .
               
              But
               
              if
               
              thou
               
              diest
               
              before
               
              I
               
              come
              ,
               
              thou
               
              art
              
              a
               
              mocker
               
              of
               
              my
               
              labor
              .
               
              Well
               
              said
              .
               
              Thou
               
              look’st
              
              cheerly
              ,
               
              and
               
              I’ll
               
              be
               
              with
               
              thee
               
              quickly
              .
               
              Yet
               
              thou
               
              liest
              
              in
               
              the
               
              bleak
               
              air
              .
               
              Come
              ,
               
              I
               
              will
               
              bear
               
              thee
               
              to
               
              some
              
              shelter
              ,
               
              and
               
              thou
               
              shalt
               
              not
               
              die
               
              for
               
              lack
               
              of
               
              a
               
              dinner
               
              if
              
              there
               
              live
               
              anything
               
              in
               
              this
               
              desert
              .
               
              Cheerly
              ,
               
              good
              
              Adam
              .
